changelog: Fixed scanner return/checkout glitch and success-dialog extra-pop navigation issues
Overdue books are now consistently returnable
Prevented wrong-row Google Sheets updates with exact row lookup and duplicate-ID protection
Added strict APK SHA-256 verification (install blocked on missing/mismatch hash)
Hardened release signing configuration for production builds
Upgraded Flutter/Android toolchain and dependencies to latest compatible versions
Added focused regression tests for scanner flow, row mapping, and update integrity
Applied subtle premium UI polish and background motion on Home, Scanner, and Update dialog
